
BLE Image Updates

v1.2.0 / 18-August-2025:
 -Update the rf driver to support the CTE I/Q data reception.
 -Wakeup the baseband after check it entered the deep sleep mode.
 -Update the ticktimer clock source to XTAL32.768k.
 -Fix the ADPLL re_initialization error.

* INFO1 information on successful install:
 INFO1_EXTIMGTYPE0: 2
 INFO1_EXTIMGVERSION0: 0x01020000
 INFO1_EXTIMGSTARTADDR0: 0x5B8000
 INFO1_EXTIMGENDADDR0: 0x5FFFFF
  
v1.1.0 / 23-June-2025:
Initial CM4 BLE firmware release:
This release is Bluetooth 5.4 compliant, targeting BLE features only. 
 -All packet types (Broadcasting / Advertising / Data / Control / ISO / Long Range). 
 -Advertising Extension. 
 -Isochronous channel operations support (CIS/BIS/proprietary mode). 
 -Encryption / Decryption (AES-CCM). 
 -Frequency Hopping calculation (scheme #1 and scheme #2). 
 -Low power modes support.
 -WLAN Coexistence mechanism(1-wire PTA 2-wire PTA 3-wire PTA and 4-wire PTA ). 
 -All device classes support (Broadcaster, Central, Observer, Peripheral). 
 
* INFO1 information on successful install:
 INFO1_EXTIMGTYPE0: 2
 INFO1_EXTIMGVERSION0: 0x01010000
 INFO1_EXTIMGSTARTADDR0: 0x5B8000
 INFO1_EXTIMGENDADDR0: 0x5FFFFF
 
*The following BLE features are tested:
 -Packet types (Broadcasting / Advertising / Data / Control).
 -Encryption / Decryption (AES-CCM). 
 -Frequency Hopping calculation (scheme #1 and scheme #2).
 -Low power modes support.
 -WLAN Coexistence mechanism(1-wire PTA 2-wire PTA 3-wire PTA and 4-wire PTA ). 
 -Device classes support (Broadcaster, Observer, Peripheral).
 -LE Data Packet Length Extension.
 -LE Security Connection.
 -Vendor commands for updating BT address,LE features and NVDS management.

*The following BLE features will be tested in future releases:
 -LE audio.
 -LE Long Range(Coded PHY).
 -Advertising Extension.
 -LE Power Control.
 -Power consumption of the idle connection and advertising
 
* Known issues/Limitations:
 -There is issue with CTE I/Q data reception.
